description: Verse bridge handling merges cells to align bridged and non-bridged content

expectedBehavior.cellMerging: ExpandGrabCountToAlignCells merges up to MAX_CELLS_TO_GRAB (3) cells
expectedBehavior.bridgeDisplay: Bridged content in one cell, separate verses merged in other column
expectedBehavior.maxMerge: Maximum 3 cells can be merged together (DC-005)
expectedBehavior.alignment: Cells aligned so bridged content matches merged separate verses

sampleScenario.result: Comparative cells for v.1 and v.2 merged to align with bridge

verificationNotes: Critical edge case EC-002 with severity Critical
Cells are merged in the column that needs alignment
Merging prevents row alignment from breaking entirely
If more than 3 cells would need merging, partial merge occurs
